Name: Adobe Photoshop
Description: From photo editing and compositing to digital painting, animation, and graphic design — you can do it all in Photoshop.

Name: Gimp
Description: GIMP - The GNU Image Manipulation Program: The Free and Open Source Image Editor.

Name: Affinity Photo
Description: The only fully loaded photo editor integrated across Mac, Windows and iOS, Affinity Photo is the first choice of thousands of professionals around the world.

Name: Photopea
Description: Photopea Online Photo Editor lets you edit photos, apply effects, filters, add text, crop or resize pictures. Do Online Photo Editing in your browser for free!

Name: Pixelmator Pro
Categories: Image Manipulation, Digital Painting, Graphic Art, UX/UI Design
Description: Pixelmator Pro is a beautiful, easy-to-use, and very powerful image editor for the Mac. With it’s cutting edge technologies, Pixelmator Pro is the most modern way to create, edit, and enhance your images.

Name: Bloom
Description: Bloom is a fast, light-weight, cross-platform procedural graphics editor that lets you tweak any action you have ever perfromed - organized by layer.

Name: Microsoft Paint
Description: Microsoft Paint is still in Windows. Search for it by typing paint in the taskbar.

Name: paint dot net
Description: Paint.NET is free image and photo editing software for computers that run Windows.

Name: LodePaint
Description: Download LodePaint for free. Painting program aimed especially at creating and editing textures and sprites, but also for general purpose image editing. Rendered with OpenGL.

Name: Autodesk Sketchbook
Description: Use SketchBook software for digital painting, drawing, sketching, and illustrated art. SketchBook can also be used to render ideas and create illustrations.

Name: Krita
Description: Krita is a professional FREE and open source painting program. It is made by artists that want to see affordable art tools for everyone.

Name: MyPaint
Description: MyPaint is an easy-to-use painting program which works well with Wacom graphics tablets and other similar devices. It comes with a large brush collection including charcoal and ink to emulate real media, but the highly configurable brush engine allows you to experiment with your own brushes and with not-quite-natural painting.

Name: Painter
Description: Experience the world's most realistic and professional digital art & painting software for Mac and Windows, featuring hundreds of realistic brushes, paint and tutorials

Name: Procreate
Description: Procreate is the most powerful and intuitive digital illustration app available for iPad. It's packed with features artists love, and it's an iPad exclusive.

Name: Fire Alpaca
Description: FireAlpaca is the free Digital Painting Software that is available in 10 languages and compatible with both Mac and Windows.

Name: Black Ink
Description: Black Ink is a digital painting software that uses your computer's rendering hardware to provide a perfectly responsive experience no matter your picture's size.

Name: Paint Tool Sai
Description: PaintTool SAI is high quality and lightweight painting software, fully digitizer support, amazing anti-aliased paintings, provide easy and stable operation, this software make digital art more enjoyable and comfortable.

Name: OpenToonz
Description: OpenToonz - Open-source Animation Production Software

Name: Clip Studio Paint
Description: Graphics software and app designed for drawing and painting, available for Windows, macOS, iPad and iPhone.

Name: Magma Studio
Description: Spark your creativity and improve your skills by painting with other artists on a shared canvas in real-time with Magma Studio. Hassle-free, no installation required.

Name: Pencil 2D
Description: Pencil2D is a simple 2D animation, drawing and painting application that lets you create traditional hand-drawn animation using both bitmap and vector graphics.

Name: Synfig
Description: Free and open-source animation software

Name: Spine
Description: Spine is 2D skeletal animation software for video games. Bring your Unity, C#, cocos2d-x, iOS, Android, C++, HTML5, JS and other games alive with 2D animation!

Name: DragonBones
Description: DragonBones is a 2D game animation and righ media content creative platform for designer. It provides 2D animation solution and motion comic solution. It contains a integrated creative tool DragonBones Pro, Flash Pro plugin for animation export and lots of runtime libraries for game engines and platforms.

Name: Live2D Cubism
Description: Live2D Cubism dynamically animates an illustration exactly as it is drawn, using just a single source illustration and not requiring individual frames to be drawn.

Name: Real Illusion CrazyTalk Animator
Description: Cartoon Animator is a 2D animation software designed with many intuitive animation tools that make this software a powerful companion in many fields.

Name: Spriter
Description: Spriter 2 is being built from the ground up to offer a new level of flexibility and ease of use for 2d game animation. It will be built around advanced image deforming, bone and curve manipulation, and lots of other completely new features to help game creators make the most impressive visuals as easily as possible.

Name: Fusion Character Animator
Description: A small tool to facilitate Sprites animation 2D characters for developers.

Name: Unity Anima 2D
Description: Get the Unity Anima2D package from Unity Technologies and speed up your game development process. Find this & other Essentials options on the Unity Asset Store.

Name: Coa Tools
Description: COA Tools is a 2D Animation Suite for blender. It offers a 2D cutout animation workflow similar to programs like spine or spriter. - ndee85/coa_tools

Name: Toon Boom Harmony
Description: Harmony 20, the industry's leading 2D animation software, brings the latest in digital drawing sensitivity to its brushes — every marking, every style, every texture you want to create and leave for the audience is felt. Rulers, guides, colour control & features as well as innovative deformers enrich your animation, bringing reality and fantasy within millimeters of each other.

Name: Toon Boom Storyboard Pro
Description: Storyboard Pro 7 is an all-in-one storyboard solution that combines drawing, scripting, camera controls, animatic creation capabilities and sound.

Name: Storyboarder
Description: Storyboarder makes it easy to visualize a story as fast you can draw stick figures. Quickly draw to test if a story idea works. Create and show animatics to others. Express your story idea without mak

Name: Laigter
Description: Simple normal map generator for 2D sprites!

Name: Sprite DLight
Description: Sprite DLight is a tool providing a new generation of voluminous one-click normal maps from 2D sprites like pixel art for dynamic lighting effects in games.

Name: Sprite Lamp
Description: Sprite Lamp is a software tool to help game developers combine 2D art with dynamic lighting effects, through the creation of hand drawn normal maps.

Name: Sprite Illuminator
Description: SpriteIlluminator: Generate normal maps for your 2d game and web projects.

Name: BriteSprite (Unity Plugin)
Description: Get the BriteSprite: 2D Normalmapper package from 2D Assassins and speed up your game development process. Find this & other Tools options on the Unity Asset Store.

Name: Marmoset Hexel Suite
Categories: Pixel Art, Graphic Art, Paint, Animation
Description: Marmoset Hexels is a grid-based painting tool for creating complex pixel and vector designs with the stroke of a brush. Try the 14 day free trial today! Useful for isometric and hexagonal art.

Name: Pro Motion NG
Categories: Pixel Art, Pixel Animation, Tiled Map
Description: Pro Motion is a pixel drawing and animation software designed similar to the famous Amiga Deluxe Paint (DPaint). Ideal for artists working on detailed and pixel precise graphics as required for mobile games and portable game consoles. It also suites well to create light weight graphics for web games.

Name: Pyxel Edit
Description: Pyxel Edit pixel art and tile creation tool

Name: GraFx2
Description: GrafX2 is a bitmap paint program inspired by the Amiga programs ​Deluxe Paint and Brilliance. Specialized in 256-color drawing, it includes a very large number of tools and effects that make it particularly suitable for pixel art, game graphics, and generally any detailed graphics painted with a mouse.

Name: Aseprite
Description: Animated sprite editor & pixel art tool

Name: Grahics Gale
Description: Powerful tool for spriting and pixel art

Name: piskel
Description: Piskel, free online sprite editor. A simple web-based tool for Spriting and Pixel art. Create pixel art, game sprites and animated GIFs. Free and open-source.

Name: PixelShop
Description: PixelShop is a small but very powerful program for Windows and OSX to create pixel art.

Name: GoyaPixel
Description: A pixel-art editor built on ClojureScript and Om that runs on your browser.

Name: Pixelorama

Name: Lospec Pixel Editor
Description: The Lospec Pixel Editor is a free, easy to use tool for creating pixel art that you can use right in your browser.

Name: Pikopixel
Description: PikoPixel is a free, open-source Mac application for drawing & editing pixel-art images. Also runs on other Unix-like platforms (Linux, BSD), using the GNUstep framework.

Name: Tilemancer
Description: Procedural pixel-art tile creator

Name: Adobe Illustrator
Description: The industry-standard vector graphics software lets you create everything from web and mobile graphics to logos, icons, book illustrations, product packaging, and billboards.

Name: Affinity Designer
Description: Available for Windows, Mac and iPad, Affinity Designer is an award-winning vector graphics software setting the new industry standard in the world of design.

Name: Inkscape
Description: Inkscape is professional quality vector graphics software which runs on Linux, Mac OS X and Windows desktop computers.

Name: Gravit Designer
Description: Create graphics, design logos and icons, edit images illustrations & presentations, all for free. Online professional vector graphic design tool - Gravit Designer

Name: Vectr
Description: Free vector graphics editor. A simple yet powerful web and desktop cross-platform tool for everyone.

Name: Lunacy
Description: Lunacy is a native Windows app that opens, edits, and stores .sketch files. And it’s completely free.

Name: Sketch
Description: Sketch is a design toolkit built to help you create your best work — from your earliest ideas, through to final artwork.

Name: Invision Studio
Description: The world’s most powerful screen design tool. Rapid prototyping, animation, built-in design systems, and collaboration—all in one place.

Name: Adobe XD
Description: Share your story with designs that look and feel like the real thing. Wireframe, animate, prototype, collaborate, and more — it’s all right here, all in one place.

Name: Figma
Description: Build better products as a team. Design, prototype, and gather feedback all in one place with Figma.

Name: Framer

Name: Moqups

Name: Mockup
Description: Visualize and Collaborate on Mobile App Design.

Name: Pencil Project
Description: An open-source GUI prototyping tool that's available for ALL platforms.

Name: icofx

Name: Texture Packer

Name: Leshy Labs Sprite Sheet Animator
Description: Leshy SpriteSheet Animator is an HTML5 tool for previewing and testing sprite sheet animations.

Name: Magic Pixelator
Description: Get the Magic Pixelator package from GamesForTutti and speed up your game development process. Find this & other Sprite Management options on the Unity Asset Store.

Name: Filter Forge
Description: A standalone program and a plugin for Adobe Photoshop and Affinity Photo that allows you to apply thousands of photo effects and generate seamless PBR textures for Unity3D, Unreal and other 3D engines.

Name: FontSprite
Description: Simple fontsprite editing with lots of functions

Name: FontForge
Description: FontForge is free and open-source outline font editor.

Name: BitFontMaker
Description:
BitFontMaker2™ is a fast and easy online bitmap font editor.
You can edit and build a pixel-font on your web browser.

Name: FontStruct
Description: FontStruct. Build, Share, Download Fonts.

Name: NFG's Arcade Font Engine
Description: NFG loves fonts. It's a sad little addiction that brought him to this: a page that allows you to create your own images, with words of your choosing, using fonts unceremoniously ripped from beloved arcade games of yore.

Name: Angel Code Bitmap Font Generator
Description: This program will allow you to generate bitmap fonts from TrueType fonts. The application generates both image files and character descriptions that can be read by a game for easy rendering of fonts.

Name: High Logic FontCreator
Description: FontCreator is the world's leading font editor built to help you create amazing new fonts and edit existing fonts.

Name: 71 Square Glyph Designer
Description: Glyph Designer is a powerful bitmap font generator app for Mac. Create beautifully styled fonts to enhance your apps and games.

Name: Cool Text Graphics Generator
Description: Cool Text is a FREE graphics generator for web pages and anywhere else you need an impressive logo without a lot of design work.

Name: ShoeBox
Description: ShoeBox is a free Adobe Air based app for Windows and Mac OSX with game and ui related tools. Each tool uses a drag and drop - or clipbord interaction for a quick workflow.

Name: RexPaint
Description: REXPaint, A powerful and user-friendly ASCII art editor by Grid Sage Games
